arCallbackSets.szOnSetCompleteScript:
idAnetaClone = Hydra.CreatePersonalClone(idAneta, true)

if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idAnetaClone) then
	Hydra.QActorWait(idAnetaClone, 1)
	Hydra.QActorPlayConversation(convAnetaTired, idSelf, idAnetaClone)
	Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(idAnetaClone)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idAnetaClone, idAnetaExhausted, "NPC_Walk", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idAnetaClone, idAnetaExhausted)
	Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(idAnetaClone, "NPC_Idle_Stand_Exhausted")
	Hydra.QActorWaitForConversationFinished(idAnetaClone, convAnetaTired)
	Hydra.QActorDeletePersonalClone(idAnetaClone) 
end

Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	-- Aneta runs over like in quest 1 and starts harvesting. bHarvesting = true
	-- While doing so she has some stuff to say about her life
	-- then we fire a user event to signal to progress user event count
	
	local idAnetaFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Aneta_Follower")
	local idCorpse = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActor(idActorDetector)[1]
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idAnetaFollower) then
		if Hydra.IsPlayerVariableSet(idSelf, "QST_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_Liver1Harvested") == false and bAnetaHarvesting == false then
		
			bPlayerInTrigger = true
			Hydra.ActorDisableAI(idAnetaFollower)
			Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convCorpseCallout, idSelf, idAnetaFollower)
			Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idAnetaFollower, idActorDetector, "NPC_Run", true)
			Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idAnetaFollower, idActorDetector, true)
			Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idAnetaFollower)
			
			if bPlayerInTrigger == true and bAnetaHarvesting == false then 
				bAnetaHarvesting = true
				Hydra.QActorPhasedAnimLoop(idAnetaFollower, "AnimKey_Use_Crouch", 7)
				Hydra.Wait(1)
				Hydra.ActorPlayConversation("QST_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_0"..tostring(Hydra.GetPlayerVariableNumericValue(idSelf, "QST_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_LiversFound")), idSelf, idAnetaFollower)
				Hydra.Wait(2)
				Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idCorpse, fxBloodSplat)
				Hydra.Wait(6)
				
				-- HGP: The reason this starts at 3 instead of 1 is because I didn't
				-- think to make the bark a single script call and concatonate the 
				-- conversation filename until I'd already made 2 other conversations
				-- So the first bark converstion is _03, etc. Ah well. Video games, right?
				Hydra.IncrementPlayerVariableNumeric(idSelf, "QST_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_LiversFound", 1)
				Hydra.EventSend("LiverGathered", idSelf)
				Hydra.SetPlayerVariableFlag(idSelf, "QST_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_Liver1Harvested")
				Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idAnetaFollower)
				bAnetaHarvesting = false
			end
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	
	bPlayerInTrigger = false
	if bAnetaHarvesting == false then
		local idAnetaFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Aneta_Follower")
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idAnetaFollower) then
			Hydra.QActorStopAllQueuedActions(idAnetaFollower)
			Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idAnetaFollower)
		end
	end
	
end

arCallbackSets.szOnSetCompleteScript:
local idAnetaFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Aneta_Follower")

Hydra.QActorWaitForConversationFinished(idAnetaFollower, convAnetaChat_04)
Hydra.QActorWait(idAnetaFollower, 0.5)
Hydra.QActorPlayConversation(convFinishedHarvesting, idSelf, idAnetaFollower)
Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()

arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	idVeraClone = Hydra.CreatePersonalClone(idVeraSwamp, true)

	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convVeraBarkFar)
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convVeraBarkFar2)
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convVeraBarkFar3)
		
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVeraClone) then
		Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convVeraBark, idSelf, idVeraClone, idAnetaSwamp)
		Hydra.Wait(9)
		Hydra.QActorPhasedAnimLoop(idVeraClone, "AnimKey_Die_Phased", 0)
		Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(idVeraClone, convVeraBark)
		Hydra.QActorDelete(idVeraClone)
		Hydra.EventSend("VeraDies")
	end
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convGulyasLetter, idSelf, idGulyasInside)
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convGulyasLetter)

end

function Start()

	idVeraClone = Hydra.CreatePersonalClone(idVeraCave)
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVeraClone) then
		Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(idVeraClone)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idVeraClone, idVeraRunLoc, "NPC_Run", true) 
		Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idVeraClone, 0.5)
	end
	
end

szOnStartupScript:
bPlayerInTrigger = false
bAnetaHarvesting = false

-- HGP: The reason this starts at 3 instead of 1 is because I didn't
-- think to make the bark a single script call and concatonate the 
-- conversation filename until I'd already made 2 other conversations
-- So the first bark converstion is _03, etc. Ah well. Video games, right?
intCorpsesHarvesting = 3
